lead_paragraph: A new, nine-page report blames government forces and rebels for the declining humanitarian situation, in which starvation, lack of government oversight and violence reign.

headline.print_headline: African Union Says Situation in South Sudan Is Worsening
headline.main: African Union Says Crisis in South Sudan Is Worsening

snippet: A new, nine-page report blames government forces and rebels for the declining humanitarian situation, in which starvation, lack of government oversight and violence reign.
abstract: Two new reports describes dire humanitarian situation in South Sudan; violent clashes between tribes amid economic meltdown have led to extreme human rights abuses by both government and opposition forces with little hope for resolution.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
